text: This is a list of the General Top 20 songs of 2009 in Mexico according to Monitor Latino. Monitor Latino also issued separate year-end charts for Regional Mexican, Pop and Anglo songs. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center" |- ! scope="col" | № ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Artist(s) |- ! scope="row" | 1 | "Te presumo" || Banda el Recodo |- ! scope="row" | 2 | "Que te quería" || La Quinta Estación |- ! scope="row" | 3 | "Aquí estoy yo" || Luis Fonsi ft. title: List of top 20 songs of 2009 in Mexico
